snippet: No, it’s not science fiction: for those who have run out of places to go, companies are competing to take amateur astronauts into the heights, and beyond.
abstract: Companies like Virgin Galactic are competing to take amateur astronauts into the upper reaches of the atmosphere and beyond; commercial space tourism is becoming a big business, even if the technology, details and destinations are years away from being fully realized; chart compares six companies planning to offers such adventures.
lead_paragraph: No, it’s not science fiction: for those who have run out of places to go, companies are competing to take amateur astronauts into the heights, and beyond.

headline.seo: Space Tourism Is Here! Wealthy Adventurers Wanted
headline.main: Space Tourism Is Here! Wealthy Adventurers Wanted
